text: A little nonsense now and then is relished by the wisest men.
author: Roald Dahl

text: Some men never feel small, but these are the few men who are.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

text: Make no little plans they have no magic to stir men's blood.
author: Daniel Burnham

text: What affects men sharply about a foreign nation is not so much finding or not finding familiar things it is rather not finding them in the familiar place.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

text: All men should strive to learn before they die, what they are running from, and to, and why.
author: James Thurber
